import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";//Styles
import"./ImageContainer.scss";//Interfaces
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";//Component
var ImageContainer=function ImageContainer(props){//Properties
var imageSource=props.data.imageSource;var imageAlt=props.data.imageAlt;var imageHrefType=props.data.imageHrefType;var imageHref=props.data.imageHref||"";//Functions
var generateImage=function generateImage(){if(imageHref){if(imageHrefType==="internalLink"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:imageHref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageSource,alt:imageAlt})});}else if(imageHrefType==="externalLink"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:imageHref,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageSource,alt:imageAlt})});}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageSource,alt:imageAlt});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ImageContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inner",children:generateImage()})});};export default ImageContainer;
